div.a: 100-Car Pileup Leaves At Least 2 Dead, Scores Injured

div.div: Two people died and more than 80 were hurt Thursday when at least 100 vehicles collided on a Texas highway in dense fog, leaving trucks twisted on top of each other and authorities rushing to pull survivors from the wreckage.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UVJ5ZD&via=Digg&text=100-Car Pileup Leaves At Least 2 Dead, Scores Injured

div.div: DRUG DEALERS SIMPLY HATE NAME CHANGES

It's the one fact about Mexico that you probably didn't know. The country's name is not really Mexico, at least not officially. After gaining independence from Spain in 1821, Mexico officially became the "Mexican United States."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UZE2ND&via=Digg&text=Mexico May Change Its Name

div.div: WHY DON'T WE WISH ON WISHBONE THE DOG?

div.a: Why Do We Wish On The Turkey’s Wishbone?

div.div: Although Thanksgiving is a North American holiday and a recent invention in the grand scheme of things, the tradition of breaking the wishbone comes from Europe, and is thousands of years older.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UrnrhM&via=Digg&text=Why Do We Wish On The Turkey’s Wishbone?

div.a: Secret Emails Reveal Details Of Bin Laden's Burial

div.div: Osama bin Laden was buried at sea from a U.S. warship amid high secrecy that included his body being referred to as "the package" delivered by "Fedex," secret military emails reveal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y4XhG7&via=Digg&text=Secret Emails Reveal Details Of Bin Laden's Burial

div.a: The End Of The Facebook Democracy

div.div: A lot of people don't know this, but Facebook actually puts major site and privacy changes up to a user vote. Now it wants to stop. What Facebook's dead-of-night end-of-suffrage proposals mean for you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RWqsWV&via=Digg&text=The End Of The Facebook Democracy

div.div: HOLDS UP BETTER THAN THE IRON CURTAIN

div.a: Behind The Iron Dome: How Israel Stops Missiles

div.div: The system has stopped roughly 90 percent of incoming missiles, not counting the hundreds that it let through deliberately because it was clear they would land in unoccupied areas, according to a spokesman for the Israeli Ministry of Defense. Iron Dome has undoubtedly saved the lives of Israeli citizens.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sf0z4w&via=Digg&text=Behind The Iron Dome: How Israel Stops Missiles

div.div: In all the hullabaloo about Facebook’s new terms of service, which take away your right to vote on changes to Facebook’s privacy and other policies, we’re missing a larger story. Facebook is breaking down the walls that separated your personal data on Facebook and Instagram, and the results could be profound.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y67QIR&via=Digg&text=Are Ads Coming To Instagram?

div.div: SOMEBODY MOVED IT WITH A DONKEY WHEEL
A South Pacific island, shown on marine charts and world maps as well as on Google Earth and Google Maps, does not exist, Australian scientists say.

div.a: Three Entire Countries Had Their 'Assassin's Creed III' Shipments Stolen

div.div: It seems that every single copy of the PC version of Assassin's Creed III bound for store shelves in the Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg was being shipped in a single truck. And that truck has been stolen by criminals.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10gOpNg&via=Digg&text=Three Entire Countries Had Their 'Assassin's Creed III' Shipments Stolen

div.a: How Warlike Were Native Americans Before Europeans Arrived?

div.div: Native Americans definitely waged war long before Europeans showed up. The evidence is especially strong in the American Southwest, where archaeologists have found numerous skeletons with projectile points embedded in them and other marks of violence; war seems to have surged during periods of drought.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SeFash&via=Digg&text=How Warlike Were Native Americans Before Europeans Arrived?

div.a: Holy Crap A Lot Of Planes Fly For Thanksgiving

div.div: Thanksgiving means turkey. Thanksgiving means football. Thanksgiving also means a helluva lot of people taking a helluva lot of flights to get home the Wednesday before Thanksgiving.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WzX11j&via=Digg&text=Holy Crap A Lot Of Planes Fly For Thanksgiving

div.a: Why The World's Fastest Computer Is A Scientific 'Time Machine'

div.div: This week it became official: the Titan supercomputer at Oak Ridge National Laboratory in Tennessee was crowned the fastest computer on Earth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uf2mIV&via=Digg&text=Why The World's Fastest Computer Is A Scientific 'Time Machine'

div.a: Eight People Who Survived By Performing Surgery On Themselves

div.div: We all hear about people hacking off their own arms or legs to free themselves, and that seems horrible enough. But what about the people who need to do more than sawing? People who, while causing themselves terrible pain, also have to keep their head together enough to perform a surgery?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TfT1kp&via=Digg&text=Eight People Who Survived By Performing Surgery On Themselves
